cast.name: 安托万·贝特朗 Antoine Bertrand

writer.name: 娜代治·卢瓦索 Nadège Loiseau

director.name: 娜代治·卢瓦索 Nadège Loiseau

introduction: The story revolves around three hobos: Brindille, Casquette and La Flèche. Every Tuesday, Brindille and Casquette play the lottery. They lose, but, for a brief moment, they allow themselves to dream. This Tuesday, it’s La Flèche who buys a lottery ticket and Brindille doesn’t like it. But, as it turns out, they win! They’re 125,000 euros up! Their victory represents a way out for them, but it also signals the beginning of a host of new problems, because getting their hands on the money proves to be something of a challenge. Without identity papers, without a home and without no guarantor to speak of, it won’t be easy for them to change their lives...
